TopicTitle: Cannot grab parts from parts menu in VAB after moving camera with 6DOF device

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version** 1.0.0.830 (WindowsPlayer)

OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

CPU: Intel® Xeon® CPU W3530 @ 2.80GHz (4)

RAM: 12286

GPU: ATI FirePro V4800 (FireGL) Graphics Adapter (1013MB)

SM: 30 (Direct3D 9.0c [aticfx32.dll 8.17.10.1315])

RT Formats: ARGB32, Depth, ARGBHalf, RGB565, ARGB4444, ARGB1555, Default, DefaultHDR, ARGBFloat, RGFloat, RGHalf, RFloat, RHalf, R8

**What Happens** After using a 6DOF device (SpaceMouse Pro) in the VAB, parts that are selected from the menu appear directly behind where they were clicked on the menu and cannot be selected. Console returns error 

"[EditorLogic]: Selected Part was lost for unknown reasons! This is possibly unwanted behaviour."

**Mods** Stock

**Steps to Replicate** 

1. Move camera with 6DOF device (don't know if this happens with other devices, this is the only one I have) 

2. Try to grab a part from the parts menu

**Other**

Pastebin link of output.log [http://pastebin.com/6LCxbuTf](http://pastebin.com/6LCxbuTf)

Screenshot (capsule in lower right corner behind the console is editable, the one on the top left is not.)

[![TF7YR3O.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/TF7YR3O.jpg)](http://imgur.com/TF7YR3O)
Can confirm this happens with 3DConnexion SpaceNavigator as well.
Also happens with SpaceMouse Pro Wireless, right pain in the bum !
